data.title: Mohawk Industries, Inc.
data.text:
Who Are We?

Mohawk is the worldâ€™s largest flooring company and so much more. With leading market positions on four continents, Mohawk offers a comprehensive array of fashionable, high performance and sustainable flooring options for residential and commercial spaces as well as a growing selection of products for surfaces beyond the floor.

Commercial Flooring

Mohawk combines innovative design and exceptional performance in a variety of soft and hard surface options for every commercial space.

Luxury Vinyl Tile

In both rigid and flexible LVT, Mohawk offers exceptional visuals that replicate wood, stone and porcelain while delivering outstanding performance and water resistance.

Sheet Vinyl

Mohawk is an international leader in sheet vinyl, with advanced technology and superior design that produces realistic visuals, deeper textures and bolder colors.

Countertops

An extensive assortment of quartz, porcelain and natural stone options in countertops and slabs provides beautiful, durable and versatile surfaces for homes and commercial spaces.

Panels

A broad range of chipboard, MDF, melamine-faced, HPL panels and mezzanine flooring solutions for construction, interior design, furniture, cabinetry and other residential and commercial applications.
